channel.title: This might sound stupid but il ask anyway... Is making a private server against
channel.description: Is making a private server against the rules? Can u get black mark or baned for it?

item.title: This might sound stupid but il ask anyway... Is making a private server against
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

nah u cant get banned (well u might but they are never gonna find out). when i started i had the same fear, but iv been playing private servers for a while and im still not banned, but i found out something else: private servers are way more awsome!! and iv stopped playing my real rs account almost completely!!

Read full topic

item.title: This might sound stupid but il ask anyway... Is making a private server against
item.dc:creator: @defyboy defyboy
item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

uhhâ€¦ There isnt a rule that says you cant. But modifying/copying the client / cache are copyright material which is against the law.

They wont ban you for running a private server unless they know your characters.

Asking for the latest deob on the runescape forums is funny but not recommended.

Read full topic
